detaileddescription.para: Creates and captures a message handler which deals with warning, information, and dialog (interactive shell) methods.

simplesect.para: The message handler does not handle error messages. For that see SCIPmessageSetErrorPrinting()
Creating a message handler automatically captures it.

briefdescription.para: data pointer which will be passed to the error printing method, or NULL

detaileddescription.para: Method to set the error printing method. Setting the error printing method to NULL will suspend all error methods.

simplesect.para: The error printing method is a static variable. This means that all occurring errors are handled via this method.

detaileddescription.para: Method to set the error printing method to default version prints everything the stderr.
